attributes.action: either ban smoking, drinking or driving altogether or stop taxing them so much that the ordinary man can't afford them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems to me that to tax something to restrict its use is grossly unfair on poorer people as it has a disproportionate affect on them, the rich can just carry on with no change to their lifestyle but the rest must either curtail their use or stop altogether.
Surely a fairer way is to either educate people to cut back or in the case of petrol for example give everyone an allowance then the burden of restriction falls equally on everyone.
